akn:content.akn:p: A person who violates any provision of ยง 16-1022 and who takes the child to a place within the District, or detains or conceals the child within the District of Columbia is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to fine not exceeding $250 or performance of community service not exceeding 240 hours, or both.
A person who violates any provision of ยง 16-1022 and who takes the child to a place outside the District or detains or conceals the child outside the District shall be punished as follows:
